Index.meta_title: DLV Insight - Plan, Forecast, and Measure Your Amazon Success
Index.meta_description: The only platform with Plan vs. Fact P&L analysis and advanced LTV cohort analytics for strategic Amazon sellers. Transform your Amazon business from reactive to strategic.

Hero.title: Plan, <important>Forecast</important>, and Measure Your Amazon Success
Hero.description: The only platform that compares your plans to reality with advanced P&L forecasting and LTV cohort analytics. Transform your Amazon business from reactive to strategic.

Features.section_title: Everything You Need to Succeed on Amazon
Features.section_description: Comprehensive analytics platform designed specifically for Amazon sellers who want to plan, forecast, and grow strategically.
Features.feature_description: Built for Amazon sellers who demand more than just basic reporting.

Pricing.section_title: Pricing That Scales with Your Success
Pricing.section_description: Choose the plan that fits your business. All plans include our core features with no hidden fees. ROI guaranteed within 30 days.

FAQ.question1: How is this different from other Amazon analytics tools?
FAQ.answer1: DLV Insight is the only platform offering Plan vs. Fact P&L analysis and LTV cohort analytics. While other tools focus on historical reporting, we enable strategic planning and forecasting.
FAQ.question2: What is Plan vs. Fact analysis?
FAQ.answer2: Plan vs. Fact analysis allows you to create P&L forecasts and compare them to actual results. This helps identify performance gaps and make data-driven adjustments to hit your targets.
FAQ.answer3: Our AI-powered forecasting engine typically achieves 90%+ accuracy by analyzing historical data, market trends, and seasonality patterns specific to Amazon selling.
FAQ.question4: Do I need to connect my Amazon account?
FAQ.answer4: Yes, secure connection to your Amazon Seller Central account is required. We use official Amazon SP-API integration with bank-level encryption.
FAQ.answer5: Yes, all plans include data export capabilities. You can download reports in CSV, Excel, or PDF formats for further analysis or accounting purposes.
FAQ.answer6: All plans include email support. Professional and Enterprise plans get priority support, and Enterprise customers receive a dedicated account manager.
